intro: Unleash your creativity and help design a dream space for each of your furry friends!
description:
Step into the charming paws of exceptionally talented interior designer doggie with a flair for creativity and an eye for detail. Your mission? To help your furry friends design their dream rooms, a cozy space where they can develop their passions.

Embark on a delightful journey across15 different project tasks with an interesting story, each presenting unique design challenges and opportunities to unleash your creativity. From the room of a great film director, bakery smelling of fresh baked goods, laboratory of a brilliant inventor to the gallery of a funny circus performer, every level offers a fresh canvas to showcase your interior design prowess.

"PAWfectly Designed" combines the joy of interior design with the charm of a delightful story, offering endless opportunities for creativity and imagination. Provides a fun and enriching experience for all aspiring interior designer.

• 15 Levels: Each level presents a new room and a unique story, from helping a cat friend create a dream recording studio to designing a inventor's laboratory for a chimp.
• Extensive Furniture Collection: Choose from a vast array of furniture and decor items, including chairs, tables, potted plants, various accessories and wall art.
• Intuitive Controls: Easily place and arrange furniture.
• Free Building Mode: Unleash your imagination and decorate rooms as you like.
